name: Brittany
review:
I absolutely love the service that they Provide.Everyone there is so sweet and work in a very timely manner!BETH,
    she is the absolute best!I showed her a picture of what I wanted and she brought it to life.I will never go to anyone
    else as long as I live in Tennessee!!

name: Heather
review: My daughter had her hair done by Kristin..awesome awesome place! She loves it! Atmosphere is comfortable and the girls seem to have fun while they are doing their jobs..five star all the way!
